A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If you want nostalgia\, this film is not for you.
Rian Johnson tears down everything we know about Star Wars and creates his very own interpretation for a new generation of fans.
Yes\, there are portions of this film that could be considered blasphemous to traditional Star Wars fanatics (which kept me from giving it 5 stars)\, but this film was refreshing.
It did not take the turns we expected because it wanted us to be uncomfortable. It wanted us to evolve with the galaxy being presented to us.
